list-item.p: Gross Tumour Volume (GTV): GTV include the gross tumour as determined by imaging using CT or MRI or PET/CT.
Internal Gross Tumour Volume (iGTV): Depends on tumour location. The iGTV encompass GTV in motion and contoured using MIP.
Clinical Target Volume (CTV): Margin to account for microscopic disease depends on tumour location.
Planning Target Volume (PTV): Uniform expansion on CTV. PTV = CTV + 1–5 mm margin.
